definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: reach, attain (Targam id., Syr. mt.o0, cf. Chr-Pal. Schulth:Lex. 108; Eth. mat’awa: Ar. 0’ant.ay (for 0’amt.ay) Nö:ZMG xl (1886), 736; distinct from BH [[מָחָא]], etc., q.v.);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: reach, come to Da 6:25 ([[ל]] loc.); come unto, as far as Da 7:13 ([[עַד]] pers.); abs. arrive Da 7:22 (of time; LXX e)do/qh; v. Nes:MM 41 who cp. Ar. 9at.ay IV. give).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: reach, extend, [[ל]] loc. Da 4:8, Da 4:17, Da 4:19.
c. [[עַל]] pers. come upon, befall Da 4:21, Da 4:25.
